attributes.action: Make LGBTIA+ Sex Education part of the school curriculum
attributes.additional_details: The lack of education leads to many preventable cases of sexually transmitted diseases, as well as pushing lgbtq youth to unsafe and damaging methods of intercourses
attributes.background: This petition aims to make Same Sex education a mandatory part of the curriculum in schools. This issue is important because many LGBT+ Youth in the UK are left in the dark regarding this topic this leads them to get information from sources such as Porn which can be bad for children.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

Schools are already required to teach about intimate and sexual relationships, including sexual health, and must ensure that the needs of all pupils are appropriately met, and integrate LGBT content into their programmes of study for this area of the curriculum. You can find out more here:

https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/908013/Relationships_Education__Relationships_and_Sex_Education__RSE__and_Health_Education.pdf
